title: Udeshi Salgado
text: I’m a PhD researcher at Cardiff University. My research focuses on hybrid intelligence and vaccine demand forecasting in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs). I’m particularly interested in combining domain knowledge with probabilistic models to improve public health supply chains.

title: Udeshi Salgado
text:
🎓 Education
PhD in Business Management, Cardiff University, UK
Oct 2024 – Present
- Cardiff Business School (CARBS) EPSRC Studentship Award
- Research on global immunisation supply chains with hybrid AI
- Supervisors: Prof. Bahman Rostami‑Tabar, Dr. Thanos E Goltsos, Dr. Geraint Palmer, Dr. Xun Wang
BSc (Hons) in Statistics, University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka
Jan 2019 – Aug 2023
- Second Class Upper Division, GPA: 3.64 / 4.00
- Dissertation: Detection of Tooth Anomalies Using AI (Grade: A+)
Diploma in Software Engineering, Esoft Metro Campus, Sri Lanka
Jan 2015 – Jul 2015
- Covered OOP, C#, Java, App Development

title: Udeshi Salgado
text:
🔍 Research Interests

Vaccine supply chain forecasting

Hybrid intelligence (human + machine forecasting)

Time series analysis & probabilistic forecasting

Health data science and informatics

Inventory management in LMICs

Ethical AI and equity in global health systems
